# The `AMDGPUSetWavePriority.cpp` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pass">Pass</a> to temporarily raise the wave priority beginning the start of the shader function until its last VMEM instructions to allow younger waves to issue their VMEM instructions as well. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pass">Pass</a> to temporarily raise the wave priority beginning the start of the shader function until its last VMEM instructions to allow younger waves to issue their VMEM instructions as well.

<SectionDefinition>
